Html:
Hi,

wouldn't it be better to use the CodePlex Releases feature for publishing new releases of the Branching Guide, i.e. have only one project where new versions are posted as Releases? That way, people could just remember one link and would automatically get the most recent version when clicking the Download link on that project's Home page. That would make it much easier for us :)

Best regards, Thomas

Thomas,

Thank you for your suggestion. It seems to make sense. I will forward your suggestion to the folks setting up Codeplex sites and publishing our guidance.

Regards,
Bill Heys
VS Ranger

As CodePlex is based on TFS, shouldn't you be able to implement your branching model as well on CodePlex? ;)

Thanks for the wonderful guides!
